message: This offer takes into account the decreasing value of money over rounds. I propose we split it evenly now, considering the future rounds will be less valuable.
I think it's fair to split the money a little closer to even, considering the future devaluation.  I'm open to further negotiation, but I'm not willing to accept a 50/75 split.
Considering the decrease in value of money, I propose a more equitable split this time. I believe a 60/40 split would be fair, given the diminishing returns in future rounds.

Since the money continues to lose value, we need to find a split that's more advantageous for both of us. I think a 60/40 split is fair, and I'm willing to negotiate further if you have a better suggestion.
